New Records: Liam Livingstone smashed 87 runs in his 50th T20 international
Key Match Events: Sean Abbott's two quick wickets in the fourth over
Adil Rashid closed the game out with a single and six balls remaining
Pre-Game Insights: Travis Head's unexpected first date with the Australian captaincy
Post-Match Reflections: Travis Head's huge disappointment after the loss
Not even a remarkable display from part-time spinner Matt Short could prevent the hosts from earning the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: England levelled the T20 international series with a thrilling three-wicket victory at Cardiff
